name: Drippin CandyHood
description: cult classic of the ps2 exposing and intertwining realities of social, economic, historical and religious interactions... with more than 89 weapons, 120 vehicles of land, water, space, dimensional and air, and total gear and customization, bullet time, story mode, role and decision making that affect the plot, 13 endings, great multiplayer up to 4 on screen in competitive, cooperative, and story and the voice acting of Brittany Murphy and Robbin Williams. 1 of 4
